property.name: cm.config.reload.period.ms
property.description: How often to reload the config

property.name: mapred.jobtracker.retirejob.interval
property.description: Time to retire the jobs. Defaulting to one hour.

property.name: mapred.job.tracker.http.address
property.description: JobTracker address. For Corona - bind to any free port

property.name: cm.notifier.retry.max
property.description: Max number of retries from CM to a session client

property.name: cm.session.expiryinterval
property.description: The interval in msec after which a session client is timed out

property.name: cm.server.address
property.description: The host and port that the Corona ClusterManager runs

property.name: cm.server.http.address
property.description: The host and port for Corona ClusterManager web server

property.name: cm.sessions.num.retired
property.description: Number of retired sessions to keep in Cluster Manager memory.

property.name: mapred.job.tracker.corona.proxyaddr
property.description: The host and port for Corona ClusterManager web server

property.name: corona.proxy.job.tracker.rpcaddr
property.description: The host and port for Corona Proxy Job Tracker RPC server

property.name: cm.cpu.to.resource.partitioning
property.description: CPU to resource allocation mapping for 1 CPUs, give 2 JTs, 2 mappers and 2 reducers. for 24 CPUs, give 3 JTs, 17 mappers and 9 reducers.

property.name: mapred.max.tracker.blacklists
property.description: The number of errors for a taskTracker in various jobs after which the task tracker could be blacklisted across all jobs. The tracker will be given tasks later (after mapred.tasktracker.blacklist.reevaluation.interval msec). The tracker will become a healthy tracker after a restart.

property.name: mapred.tasktracker.blacklist.reevaluation.interval
property.description: If a task server has been blacklisted for making mapred.max.tracker.blacklists errors and it has been there for at least this long (in msec), its name will be cleared, and it may be unblacklisted (assuming there aren't any other reasons to keep it there).
